31
32#define ETHERMTU 1500
33
34/*
35 * The number of bytes in an ethernet (MAC) address.
36 */
37#define ETHER_ADDR_LEN 6
38
39/*
40 * Structure of an Ethernet header.
41 */
42struct ether_header {
43 uint8_t ether_dhost[ETHER_ADDR_LEN];
44 uint8_t ether_shost[ETHER_ADDR_LEN];
45 uint16_t ether_length_type;
46};
47
48/*
49 * Length of an Ethernet header; note that some compilers may pad
50 * "struct ether_header" to a multiple of 4 bytes, for example, so
51 * "sizeof (struct ether_header)" may not give the right answer.
52 */
53#define ETHER_HDRLEN 14
54
